message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $180. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your position, but $180 is already a competitive price.  Could you do $160?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $140. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
